title: NEW INFO: Teen shot twice in Kinston, police looking for silver SUV
content:
KINSTON, NC (WITN) - The Kinston Police Department is looking for a silver SUV after a teenager was shot twice in Kinston on Saturday afternoon.
Kinston police say 17-year-old Reginald Branch was shot once in the abdomen and once in the leg in the 900 block of West Vernon Ave. shortly after 2pm Saturday.
The victim was airlifted to Vidant Medical Center and underwent immediate surgery.
Police say his injuries were non-life threatening.
Monday morning the teen remains at Vidant, and police say they hope investigators will be able to speak with him or his family today.
